Properties needed for this method:
sCOUNTRY_CODE
sPROVINCE_CODE
sCOUNTRY_CODE
sPROVINCE_CODE
sPROVINCE_NAME
iLAPSE_DAYS_DELIVERY
sTAX_BACKOUT_FUNCTION
iLAPSE_DAYS_FIELD_SUPPLY_PREP Will fill all properties corresponding with a field in the table with the value of the row selected.

member.summary: Purpose: Implements the IDispose' method Dispose.

member.name: M:QSP.WebControl.DataAccess.Data.ConnectionProvider.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Purpose: Implements the Dispose functionality.

member.name: M:QSP.WebControl.DataAccess.Data.ConnectionProvider.InitClass
member.summary: Purpose: Initializes class members.

member.name: M:QSP.WebControl.DataAccess.Data.ConnectionProvider.OpenConnection
member.summary: Purpose: opens the connection object.
member.returns: true, if succeeded, otherwise an Exception exception is thrown.

member.name: M:QSP.WebControl.DataAccess.Data.ConnectionProvider.BeginTransaction(System.String)
member.summary: Purpose: starts a new ADO.NET transaction using the open connection object of this class.
member.param: Name of the transaction to start
member.returns: true, if transaction is started correctly, otherwise an Exception exception is thrown

member.name: M:QSP.WebControl.DataAccess.Data.ConnectionProvider.CommitTransaction
member.summary: Purpose: commits a pending transaction on the open connection object of this class.
member.returns: true, if commit was succesful, or an Exception exception is thrown

member.name: M:QSP.WebControl.DataAccess.Data.ConnectionProvider.RollbackTransaction(System.String)
member.summary: Purpose: rolls back a pending transaction on the open connection object of this class, or rolls back to the savepoint with the given name. Savepoints are created with SaveTransaction().
member.param: Name of transaction to roll back. Can be name of savepoint
member.returns: true, if rollback was succesful, or an Exception exception is thrown

member.name: M:QSP.WebControl.DataAccess.Data.ConnectionProvider.SaveTransaction(System.String)
member.summary: Purpose: Saves a pending transaction on the open connection object of this class to a 'savepoint' with the given name. When a rollback is issued, the caller can rollback to this savepoint or roll back the complete transaction.
member.param: Name of the savepoint to store the current transaction under.
member.returns: true, if save was succesful, or an Exception exception is thrown

member.name: M:QSP.WebControl.DataAccess.Data.ConnectionProvider.CloseConnection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Purpose: Closes the open connection. Depending on bCommitPendingTransactions, a pending transaction is commited, or aborted.
member.param: Flag for what to do when a transaction is still pending. True will commit the current transaction, false will abort (rollback) the complete current transaction.
member.returns: true, if close was succesful, false if connection was already closed, or an Exception exception is thrown when an error occurs
